description: Database schema for FRED economic metrics used in HowsMyEconomy.com

description.description: Short user-facing explanation of what the metric is and why it matters

category.description: Economic category this metric belongs to

update_frequency.description: How often this metric is updated by FRED

data.description: Time series data points starting from Jan 2024

yay_message.description: Short user-facing message when metric is in 'yay' state

meh_message.description: Short user-facing message when metric is in 'meh' state

nay_message.description: Short user-facing message when metric is in 'nay' state

last_updated.description: Timestamp of last successful refresh from FRED API

metrics_to_track.name: 30-Year Fixed Mortgage Rate
metrics_to_track.description: Average interest rate for 30-year fixed-rate mortgages in the US. Lower rates make buying homes more affordable.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Mortgage rates are favorable for home buyers
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Mortgage rates are stable but not ideal
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High mortgage rates are hurting affordability

metrics_to_track.name: Home Price Index
metrics_to_track.description: Tracks changes in single-family home prices across major US cities. Rising prices can reduce affordability.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Home price growth is moderate and sustainable
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Home prices are rising at a moderate pace
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Rapid home price increases are reducing affordability

metrics_to_track.name: Rent Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for rent of primary residence. Tracks how much Americans pay for housing.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Rent costs are stable or declining
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Rent costs are increasing rapidly

metrics_to_track.name: Housing Starts
metrics_to_track.description: Number of new residential construction projects begun. More housing starts can help with supply and affordability.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Strong housing construction is helping supply
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Low housing construction is limiting supply

metrics_to_track.name: Median Household Income
metrics_to_track.description: Median household income in the United States. Higher incomes improve affordability across all categories.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Household incomes are growing strongly
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Household incomes are stagnating

metrics_to_track.name: New Vehicle Prices
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for new vehicles. Tracks the cost of buying a new car or truck.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: New car prices are stable or declining
metrics_to_track.meh_message: New car prices are rising moderately
metrics_to_track.nay_message: New car prices are increasing rapidly

metrics_to_track.name: Used Vehicle Prices
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for used cars and trucks. Important for many families seeking affordable transportation.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Used car prices are becoming more affordable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Used car prices are too high

metrics_to_track.name: Gasoline Prices
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for motor fuel (gasoline). Affects daily commuting costs and overall inflation.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Gas prices are low and affordable
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Gas prices are at moderate levels
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High gas prices are straining budgets

metrics_to_track.name: Auto Loan Rates
metrics_to_track.description: Interest rates on 48-month new car loans. Lower rates make financing a vehicle more affordable.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Auto loan rates are favorable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High auto loan rates increase car costs

metrics_to_track.name: Motor Vehicle Sales
metrics_to_track.description: Domestic auto sales indicate consumer confidence and the health of the automotive market.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Strong auto sales show consumer confidence
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Weak auto sales signal economic concerns

metrics_to_track.name: Unemployment Rate
metrics_to_track.description: Percentage of labor force that is unemployed. Lower unemployment means more job opportunities.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Low unemployment means more job opportunities
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High unemployment limits job prospects

metrics_to_track.name: Nonfarm Payrolls
metrics_to_track.description: Monthly change in total nonfarm employment. Positive job growth indicates a healthy economy.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Strong job growth indicates a healthy economy
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Weak job growth signals economic concerns

metrics_to_track.name: Job Openings
metrics_to_track.description: Total number of job openings in the US. More openings mean better prospects for job seekers.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Plenty of job openings for workers
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Job openings are at moderate levels
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Few job openings limit opportunities

metrics_to_track.name: Quit Rate
metrics_to_track.description: Percentage of workers who quit their jobs. Higher quit rates often indicate worker confidence and job mobility.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: High quit rate shows worker confidence
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Quit rate is at normal levels
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Low quit rate suggests limited opportunities

metrics_to_track.name: Average Hourly Earnings
metrics_to_track.description: Average hourly earnings for all private sector employees. Rising wages help keep up with living costs.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Wages are growing faster than inflation
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Wage growth is keeping pace with costs
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Wages are not keeping up with rising costs

metrics_to_track.name: Food Prices
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for food at home. Tracks grocery costs that affect every household budget.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Food prices are stable or declining
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Food prices are increasing rapidly

metrics_to_track.name: Core Inflation
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index excluding food and energy. Measures underlying inflation trends.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Core inflation is under control
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Core inflation is at moderate levels
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High core inflation erodes purchasing power

metrics_to_track.name: PCE Price Index
metrics_to_track.description: Federal Reserve's preferred inflation measure. Shows how much more expensive things are getting.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Inflation is low and stable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High inflation is reducing buying power

metrics_to_track.name: Real Disposable Income
metrics_to_track.description: Personal income after taxes, adjusted for inflation. Shows how much spending power Americans actually have.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Real incomes are growing
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Real incomes are declining

metrics_to_track.name: Consumer Price Index (All Items)
metrics_to_track.description: Overall inflation measure including all consumer goods and services. Lower inflation preserves purchasing power.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Inflation is low and stable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High inflation is eroding purchasing power

metrics_to_track.name: S&P 500 Stock Index
metrics_to_track.description: Major stock market index tracking 500 large U.S. companies. Important for retirement and investment accounts.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Stock market gains are boosting retirement accounts
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Stock market declines are hurting retirement savings

metrics_to_track.name: 10-Year Treasury Rate
metrics_to_track.description: Interest rate on 10-year government bonds. Affects mortgage rates and retirement income from safe investments.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Treasury rates provide good safe investment returns
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Treasury rates are at moderate levels
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Low treasury rates hurt safe investment income

metrics_to_track.name: Personal Saving Rate
metrics_to_track.description: Percentage of income that Americans save. Higher saving rates indicate better financial security.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Americans are saving at healthy rates
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Low saving rates indicate financial stress

metrics_to_track.name: Medical Care Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for medical care in cities. Tracks healthcare affordability for families.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Medical care costs are stable or declining
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Medical care costs are rising moderately
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Medical care costs are increasing rapidly

metrics_to_track.name: Hospital Services Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Cost of hospital and related services. Major component of healthcare expenses.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Hospital costs are under control
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Hospital costs are increasing rapidly

metrics_to_track.name: Prescription Drug Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for prescription drugs and medical supplies. Critical for healthcare affordability.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Prescription drug costs are stable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Prescription drugs are becoming unaffordable

metrics_to_track.name: Health Care Benefits Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Employer costs for health insurance and medical benefits. Affects job compensation packages.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Health benefit costs are manageable for employers
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Health benefit costs are rising steadily
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High health benefit costs strain employer budgets

metrics_to_track.name: Employee Benefits Index
metrics_to_track.description: Employment cost index for employee benefits including health insurance. Shows benefit cost trends.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Employee benefits are improving
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Employee benefits are declining

metrics_to_track.name: College Tuition Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for college tuition and fees. Key measure of higher education affordability.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: College costs are stable or declining
metrics_to_track.nay_message: College is becoming unaffordable

metrics_to_track.name: Childcare Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for day care and preschool. Major expense for working families.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Childcare costs are manageable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Childcare is becoming unaffordable

metrics_to_track.name: Elementary School Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for elementary and high school costs. Includes private school tuition.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: School costs are affordable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: School costs are straining family budgets

metrics_to_track.name: Technical School Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for technical and trade school education. Alternative to college education.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Technical education is affordable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Technical education costs are too high

metrics_to_track.name: Student Loan Outstanding Amount
metrics_to_track.description: Total outstanding student loan debt. Indicates education financing burden on households.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Student debt burden is decreasing
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Student debt is reaching unsustainable levels

metrics_to_track.name: Electricity Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for electricity. Major utility cost for all households.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Electricity costs are stable or declining
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High electricity costs strain household budgets

metrics_to_track.name: Natural Gas Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for natural gas. Important heating and energy cost for households.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Natural gas costs are affordable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High natural gas costs are burdensome

metrics_to_track.name: Average Retail Electricity Price
metrics_to_track.description: Average price of electricity for residential customers. Direct measure of utility bill impact.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Electricity prices are reasonable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High electricity prices are straining budgets

metrics_to_track.name: Repair and Maintenance Costs
metrics_to_track.description: Consumer price index for motor vehicle maintenance and repair. Unexpected car expense category.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Repair costs are stable
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High repair costs create financial stress

metrics_to_track.name: Producer Price Index
metrics_to_track.description: Measures wholesale price changes before they reach consumers. Leading indicator of future inflation.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Producer prices signal stable consumer prices ahead
metrics_to_track.nay_message: Rising producer prices signal higher consumer costs coming

metrics_to_track.name: Household Debt to GDP
metrics_to_track.description: Total household debt as percentage of economic output. Indicates overall debt burden sustainability.
metrics_to_track.yay_message: Household debt levels are sustainable
metrics_to_track.meh_message: Household debt is at moderate levels
metrics_to_track.nay_message: High household debt creates financial vulnerability
